title: 2 Bedrooms 2 Bathrooms, Apartment with Deeds
details:
Never been used, Deeds ready apartment.
2016 August build
Nelson Place, Colombo 6
Less than 2 minutes’ walk to the Galle road with easy access to all kinds of shops and banks.
(910Sq.Ft.) 6th floor (top flor)

This is a fully Air-conditioned, 2 bedrooms apartment with 2 bathrooms; one en-suite, the other to share, the 2nd bathroom is near the kitchen. Large living room/diner opens out to the balcony giving a side sea view. Two of the bedrooms have balconies with sea view.

Kitchen mahogany pantry unit with granite worktop. There is a provision for washing machine connection; cooker hood and additional extractor fan fitted, kitchen open to balcony.

Apartment decorated to the UK living standard, all rooms and living/Dining rooms with (UK style) laminated wood flooring (oak effect).
Full length of double glazing windows (UK style) for all rooms and living/dining rooms (sound and heat proof)

Only 18 apartments in the block.
The building has lift available.
Very low maintenance fee.
There is a stand by generator that automatically kicks in when there is a power cut
The apartment has parking space with 24 hour manned security and cameras.


Price 20.5 million strictly No brokers
Tel: 077704 8426
